Name: Inception
Credit: Dir: Christopher Nolan With: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page
Outline: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

Name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
Credit: Dir: Irvin Kershner With: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher
Outline: After the rebels have been brutally overpowered by the Empire on their newly established base, Luke Skywalker takes advanced Jedi training with Master Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader as part of his plan to capture Luke.

Name: The Matrix
Credit: Dir: Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski With: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss
Outline: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

Name: Star Wars
Credit: Dir: George Lucas With: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher
Outline: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

Name: Interstellar
Credit: Dir: Christopher Nolan With: Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain
Outline: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

Name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
Credit: Dir: James Cameron With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Edward Furlong
Outline: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her young son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg, made out of liquid metal.

Name: Back to the Future

Outline: A young man is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his friend, Dr. Emmett Brown, and must make sure his high-school-age parents unite in order to save his own existence.

Name: The Prestige
Credit: Dir: Christopher Nolan With: Christian Bale, Hugh Jackman, Scarlett Johansson
Outline: Two stage magicians engage in competitive one-upmanship in an attempt to create the ultimate stage illusion.

Name: Alien
Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, John Hurt
Outline: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as distress call, their landing on the source planet finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform. Continuing their journey back to Earth with the attacked crew having recovered and the critter deceased, they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

Name: WALL·E
Credit: Dir: Andrew Stanton With: Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin
Outline: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

Name: Aliens
Credit: Dir: James Cameron With: Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn, Carrie Henn
Outline: The planet from Alien has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, the rescue team has impressive firepower, but will it be enough?

Name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
Credit: Dir: Richard Marquand With: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher
Outline: After rescuing Han Solo from the palace of Jabba the Hutt, the rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to make Vader return from the dark side of the Force.

Name: A Clockwork Orange

Name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

Name: Deadpool
Credit: Dir: Tim Miller With: Ryan Reynolds, Morena Baccarin, T.J. Miller
Outline: A former Special Forces operative turned mercenary is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers, adopting the alter ego Deadpool.

Name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
Credit: Dir: Stanley Kubrick With: Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood, William Sylvester
Outline: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

Name: Metropolis
Credit: Dir: Fritz Lang With: Brigitte Helm, Alfred Abel, Gustav FrÃ¶hlich
Outline: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

Name: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
Credit: Dir: J.J. Abrams With: Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Oscar Isaac
Outline: Three decades after the defeat of the Galactic Empire, a new threat arises. The First Order attempts to rule the galaxy and only a ragtag group of heroes can stop them, along with the help of the Resistance.

Name: PK

Name: Blade Runner
Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young

Name: Stalker
Credit: Dir: Andrei Tarkovsky With: Alisa Freyndlikh, Aleksandr Kaydanovskiy, Anatoliy Solonitsyn

Name: Mad Max: Fury Road
Credit: Dir: George Miller With: Tom Hardy, Charlize Theron, Nicholas Hoult

Name: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind
Credit: Dir: Hayao Miyazaki With: Sumi Shimamoto, Mahito Tsujimura, Hisako KyÃ´da
Outline: Warrior/pacifist Princess NausicaÃ¤ desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

Name: The Avengers
Credit: Dir: Joss Whedon With: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson
Outline: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

Name: Donnie Darko
Credit: Dir: Richard Kelly With: Jake Gyllenhaal, Jena Malone, Mary McDonnell
Outline: A troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a large bunny rabbit that manipulates him to commit a series of crimes, after narrowly escaping a bizarre accident.

Name: Solaris
Credit: Dir: Andrei Tarkovsky With: Natalya Bondarchuk, Donatas Banionis, JÃ¼ri JÃ¤rvet
Outline: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.

Name: Jurassic Park
Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum
Outline: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

Name: Guardians of the Galaxy
Credit: Dir: James Gunn With: Chris Pratt, Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper

Name: The Martian
Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig
Outline: During a manned mission to Mars, Astronaut Mark Watney is presumed dead after a fierce storm and left behind by his crew. But Watney has survived and finds himself stranded and alone on the hostile planet. With only meager supplies, he must draw upon his ingenuity, wit and spirit to subsist and find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

Name: Akira
Credit: Dir: Katsuhiro Ãtomo With: Nozomu Sasaki, Mami Koyama, Mitsuo Iwata
Outline: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath that only two kids and a group of psychics can stop.

Name: Twelve Monkeys
Credit: Dir: Terry Gilliam With: Bruce Willis, Madeleine Stowe, Brad Pitt
Outline: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

Name: The Terminator
Credit: Dir: James Cameron With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biehn
Outline: A human-looking indestructible cyborg is sent from 2029 to 1984 to assassinate a waitress, whose unborn son will lead humanity in a war against the machines, while a soldier from that war is sent to protect her at all costs.

Name: X-Men: Days of Future Past
Credit: Dir: Bryan Singer With: Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, Hugh Jackman
Outline: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

Name: Star Trek
Credit: Dir: J.J. Abrams With: Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Simon Pegg
Outline: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Commander Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful, time-traveling Romulan creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

Name: Brazil
Credit: Dir: Terry Gilliam With: Jonathan Pryce, Kim Greist, Robert De Niro
Outline: A bureaucrat in a retro-future world tries to correct an administrative error and himself becomes an enemy of the state.

Name: Ghost in the Shell
Credit: Dir: Mamoru Oshii With: Atsuko Tanaka, Iemasa Kayumi, Akio Ãtsuka
Outline: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

Name: Her
Credit: Dir: Spike Jonze With: Joaquin Phoenix, Amy Adams, Scarlett Johansson
Outline: A lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with his newly purchased operating system that's designed to meet his every need.

Name: The Iron Giant
Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Drama | Family | Sci-Fi
Credit: Dir: Brad Bird With: Eli Marienthal, Harry Connick Jr., Jennifer Aniston
Outline: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

Name: District 9
Credit: Dir: Neill Blomkamp With: Sharlto Copley, David James, Jason Cope
Outline: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly finds a kindred spirit in a government agent who is exposed to their biotechnology.

Name: Planet of the Apes
Credit: Dir: Franklin J. Schaffner With: Charlton Heston, Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter
Outline: An astronaut crew crash lands on a planet in the distant future where intelligent talking apes are the dominant species, and humans are the oppressed and enslaved.

Name: Frankenstein
Credit: Dir: James Whale With: Colin Clive, Mae Clarke, Boris Karloff
Outline: An obsessed scientist assembles a living being from parts of exhumed corpses.

Name: Serenity
Credit: Dir: Joss Whedon With: Nathan Fillion, Gina Torres, Chiwetel Ejiofor

Name: Moon

Name: G.O.R.A.
Credit: Dir: Ãmer Faruk Sorak With: Cem Yilmaz, Rasim Ãztekin, Ãzkan Ugur
Outline: A slick young Turk kidnapped by extraterrestrials shows his great Â« humanitarian spirit Â» by outwitting the evil commander-in-chief of the planet of G.O.R.A.

Name: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
Genre: Animation | Action | Crime | Drama | Sci-Fi | Thriller
Credit: Dir: ShinichirÃ´ Watanabe With: Beau Billingslea, Melissa Fahn, Nicholas Guest
Outline: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.

Name: Edge of Tomorrow
Credit: Dir: Doug Liman With: Tom Cruise, Emily Blunt, Bill Paxton
Outline: A military officer is brought into an alien war against an extraterrestrial enemy who can reset the day and know the future. When this officer is enabled with the same power, he teams up with a Special Forces warrior to try and end the war.

Name: Bride of Frankenstein
Credit: Dir: James Whale With: Boris Karloff, Elsa Lanchester, Colin Clive
Outline: Mary Shelley reveals the main characters of her novel survived: Dr. Frankenstein, goaded by an even madder scientist, builds his monster a mate.

Credit: Dir: Alfonso CuarÃ³n With: Julianne Moore, Clive Owen, Chiwetel Ejiofor
Outline: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.

Name: Iron Man
Credit: Dir: Jon Favreau With: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Terrence Howard
Outline: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, an engineer creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

Name: Mr. Nobody
Credit: Dir: Jaco Van Dormael With: Jared Leto, Sarah Polley, Diane Kruger
Outline: A boy stands on a station platform as a train is about to leave. Should he go with his mother or stay with his father? Infinite possibilities arise from this decision. As long as he doesn't choose, anything is possible.

Name: Big Hero 6
Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Sci-Fi
Credit: Dir: Don Hall, Chris Williams With: Ryan Potter, Scott Adsit, Jamie Chung

Name: Avatar
Credit: Dir: James Cameron With: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver
Outline: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

Name: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Drama | Mystery | Romance | Sci-Fi
Credit: Dir: Mamoru Hosoda With: Riisa Naka, Takuya Ishida, Mitsutaka Itakura
Outline: A high-school girl acquires the ability to time travel.

Name: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Crime | Drama | Family | Mystery | Romance | Sci-Fi | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Eric Radomski, Bruce W. Timm With: Kevin Conroy, Dana Delany, Hart Bochner
Outline: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

Name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Henry Thomas, Drew Barrymore, Peter Coyote
Outline: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home-world.

Name: Gravity
Credit: Dir: Alfonso CuarÃ³n With: Sandra Bullock, George Clooney, Ed Harris
Outline: A medical engineer and an astronaut work together to survive after an accident leaves them adrift in space.

Name: Predator
Credit: Dir: John McTiernan With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Carl Weathers, Kevin Peter Hall
Outline: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extra-terrestrial warrior.

Name: The Day the Earth Stood Still
Credit: Dir: Robert Wise With: Michael Rennie, Patricia Neal, Hugh Marlowe
Outline: An alien lands and tells the people of Earth that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets.

Name: Back to the Future Part II
Credit: Dir: Robert Zemeckis With: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson
Outline: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985... without interfering with his first trip.

Name: Open Your Eyes
Credit: Dir: Alejandro AmenÃ¡bar With: Eduardo Noriega, PenÃ©lope Cruz, Chete Lera
Outline: A very handsome man finds the love of his life, but he suffers an accident and needs to have his face rebuilt by surgery after it is severely disfigured.

Name: Gattaca
Credit: Dir: Andrew Niccol With: Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman, Jude Law
Outline: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

Name: Star Trek Into Darkness
Credit: Dir: J.J. Abrams With: Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Zoe Saldana
Outline: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction.

Name: Invasion of the Body Snatchers

Outline: A small-town doctor learns that the population of his community is being replaced by emotionless alien duplicates.

Name: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
Credit: Dir: Anthony Russo, Joe Russo With: Chris Evans, Samuel L. Jackson, Scarlett Johansson
Outline: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and Shield agent, the Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

Name: X-Men: First Class
Credit: Dir: Matthew Vaughn With: James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Jennifer Lawrence
Outline: In 1962, the United States government enlists the help of Mutants with superhuman abilities to stop a malicious dictator who is determined to start World War III.

Name: Wreck-It Ralph
Credit: Dir: Rich Moore With: John C. Reilly, Jack McBrayer, Jane Lynch
Outline: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

Name: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
Credit: Dir: Nicholas Meyer With: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley
Outline: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

Name: Paprika
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Crime | Mystery | Sci-Fi | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Satoshi Kon With: Megumi Hayashibara, TÃ´ru Emori, Katsunosuke Hori
Outline: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist can stop it: Paprika.

Name: Battle Royale
Credit: Dir: Kinji Fukasaku With: Tatsuya Fujiwara, Aki Maeda, TarÃ´ Yamamoto
Outline: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill each other under the revolutionary "Battle Royale" act.

Name: Ex Machina
Credit: Dir: Alex Garland With: Alicia Vikander, Domhnall Gleeson, Oscar Isaac
Outline: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a breath-taking humanoid A.I.

Name: Dark City
Genre: Action | Drama | Fantasy | Mystery | Sci-Fi | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Alex Proyas With: Rufus Sewell, Kiefer Sutherland, Jennifer Connelly
Outline: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun.

Name: 10 Cloverfield Lane
Credit: Dir: Dan Trachtenberg With: John Goodman, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, John Gallagher Jr.
Outline: After getting in a car accident, a woman is held in a shelter with two men, who claim the outside world is affected by a widespread chemical attack.

Name: Zombieland

Name: Forbidden Planet
Credit: Dir: Fred M. Wilcox With: Walter Pidgeon, Anne Francis, Leslie Nielsen
Outline: A starship crew goes to investigate the silence of a planet's colony only to find two survivors and a deadly secret that one of them has.

Name: The Butterfly Effect
Credit: Dir: Eric Bress, J. Mackye Gruber With: Ashton Kutcher, Amy Smart, Melora Walters
Outline: Evan Treborn suffers blackouts during significant events of his life. As he grows up, he finds a way to remember these lost memories and a supernatural way to alter his life by reading his journal.

Name: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Richard Dreyfuss, FranÃ§ois Truffaut, Teri Garr
Outline: After an encounter with U.F.O.s, a line worker feels undeniably drawn to an isolated area in the wilderness where something spectacular is about to happen.

Name: The City of Lost Children
Credit: Dir: Marc Caro, Jean-Pierre Jeunet With: Ron Perlman, Daniel Emilfork, Judith Vittet
Outline: A scientist in a surrealist society kidnaps children to steal their dreams, hoping that they slow his aging process.

Name: Minority Report
Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton
Outline: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.

Name: The Fifth Element
Credit: Dir: Luc Besson With: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, Gary Oldman
Outline: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr Zorg at bay.

Name: Watchmen

Name: Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
Credit: Dir: George Miller With: Mel Gibson, Bruce Spence, Michael Preston
Outline: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline rich, community escape a band of bandits.

Name: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
Credit: Dir: Matt Reeves With: Gary Oldman, Keri Russell, Andy Serkis
Outline: A growing nation of genetically evolved apes led by Caesar is threatened by a band of human survivors of the devastating virus unleashed a decade earlier.

Name: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
Credit: Dir: George Lucas With: Hayden Christensen, Natalie Portman, Ewan McGregor
Outline: During the near end of the clone wars, Darth Sidious has revealed himself and is ready to execute the last part of his plan to rule the Galaxy...

Name: 28 Days Later...
Credit: Dir: Danny Boyle With: Cillian Murphy, Naomie Harris, Christopher Eccleston
Outline: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.

Name: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
Credit: Dir: Mamoru Oshii With: Akio Ãtsuka, Atsuko Tanaka, Tamio Ãki
Outline: In the year 2032, BatÃ´, a cyborg detective for the anti-terrorist unit Public Security Section 9, investigates the case of a female robot--one created solely for sexual pleasure--who slaughtered her owner.

Name: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
Credit: Dir: Francis Lawrence With: Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth
Outline: Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark become targets of the Capitol after their victory in the 74th Hunger Games sparks a rebellion in the Districts of Panem.

Name: The Time Machine
Credit: Dir: George Pal With: Rod Taylor, Alan Young, Yvette Mimieux
Outline: A man's vision for a utopian society is disillusioned when travelling forward into time reveals a dark and dangerous society.

Name: The Secret of NIMH
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Drama | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
Credit: Dir: Don Bluth With: Elizabeth Hartman, Derek Jacobi, Dom DeLuise
Outline: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she ever suspected.

Name: The Abyss
Credit: Dir: James Cameron With: Ed Harris, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio, Michael Biehn
Outline: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

Name: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
Credit: Dir: Rupert Wyatt With: James Franco, Andy Serkis, Freida Pinto
Outline: A substance, designed to help the brain repair itself, gives rise to a super-intelligent chimp who leads an ape uprising.

Name: Star Trek: First Contact
Credit: Dir: Jonathan Frakes With: Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner
Outline: The Borg go back in time intent on preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.

Name: RoboCop
Credit: Dir: Paul Verhoeven With: Peter Weller, Nancy Allen, Dan O'Herlihy
Outline: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

Name: Equilibrium
Credit: Dir: Kurt Wimmer With: Christian Bale, Sean Bean, Emily Watson
Outline: In a Fascist future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system.

Name: The Fly
Credit: Dir: David Cronenberg With: Jeff Goldblum, Geena Davis, John Getz
Outline: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

Name: Avengers: Age of Ultron
Credit: Dir: Joss Whedon With: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo

Name: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit

Outline: Wallace and his loyal dog, Gromit, set out to discover the mystery behind the garden sabotage that plagues their village and threatens the annual giant vegetable growing contest.

Name: Cloud Atlas

Outline: An exploration of how the actions of individual lives impact one another in the past, present and future, as one soul is shaped from a killer into a hero, and an act of kindness ripples across centuries to inspire a revolution.

Name: Total Recall

Name: X2
Credit: Dir: Bryan Singer With: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Halle Berry

Name: Source Code

Credit: Dir: Kar-Wai Wong With: Tony Chiu Wai Leung, Ziyi Zhang, Faye Wong

Name: Looper

Name: Eraserhead

Name: Back to the Future Part III

Name: Limitless

Name: X-Men

Outline: Two mutants come to a private academy for their kind whose resident superhero team must oppose a terrorist organization with similar powers.

Name: Contact

Name: Invasion of the Body Snatchers

Name: Sunshine

Name: Mad Max

Name: Primer

Name: Independence Day

Name: Vanilla Sky

Name: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure

Name: Little Shop of Horrors

Name: The Island

Name: Logan's Run

Name: TRON: Legacy

Name: THX 1138
Credit: Dir: George Lucas With: Robert Duvall, Donald Pleasence, Don Pedro Colley
Outline: Set in the 25th century, the story centers around a man and a woman who rebel against their rigidly controlled society.

Name: Pandorum
Credit: Dir: Christian Alvart With: Dennis Quaid, Ben Foster, Cam Gigandet
Outline: A pair of crew members aboard a spaceship wake up with no knowledge of their mission or their identities.

Credit: Dir: Peter Hyams With: Roy Scheider, John Lithgow, Helen Mirren
Outline: A joint U.S.-Soviet expedition is sent to Jupiter to learn what happened to the Discovery.

Name: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
Credit: Dir: Marc Webb With: Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Jamie Foxx
Outline: When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.

Name: X-Men: The Last Stand
Credit: Dir: Brett Ratner With: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Halle Berry
Outline: When a cure is found to treat mutations, lines are drawn amongst the X-Men, led by Professor Charles Xavier, and the Brotherhood, a band of powerful mutants organized under Xavier's former ally, Magneto.

Name: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
Credit: Dir: Garth Jennings With: Martin Freeman, Yasiin Bey, Sam Rockwell
Outline: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."

Name: Underworld: Evolution
Credit: Dir: Len Wiseman With: Kate Beckinsale, Scott Speedman, Bill Nighy
Outline: Picking up directly from the previous film, vampire warrior Selene and the half werewolf Michael hunt for clues to reveal the history of their races and the war between them.

Name: Divergent
Credit: Dir: Neil Burger With: Shailene Woodley, Theo James, Kate Winslet
Outline: In a world divided by factions based on virtues, Tris learns she's Divergent and won't fit in. When she discovers a plot to destroy Divergents, Tris and the mysterious Four must find out what makes Divergents dangerous before it's too late.

Name: Innerspace
Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Joe Dante With: Dennis Quaid, Martin Short, Meg Ryan
Outline: A hapless store clerk must foil criminals to save the life of the man who, miniaturized in a secret experiment, was accidentally injected into him.

Name: Bad Taste
Credit: Dir: Peter Jackson With: Terry Potter, Pete O'Herne, Craig Smith
Outline: The population of a small town disappears and is replaced by aliens that chase human flesh for their intergalactic fast-food chain.

Name: Signs
Credit: Dir: M. Night Shyamalan With: Mel Gibson, Joaquin Phoenix, Rory Culkin
Outline: A family living on a farm finds mysterious crop circles in their fields which suggests something more frightening to come.

Name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
Credit: Dir: Steve Barron With: Judith Hoag, Elias Koteas, Josh Pais
Outline: A group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect New York City from an uprising criminal gang of ninjas.

Name: The Matrix Revolutions
Credit: Dir: Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski With: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss
Outline: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.

Name: The Wolverine
Credit: Dir: James Mangold With: Hugh Jackman, Will Yun Lee, Tao Okamoto
Outline: When Wolverine is summoned to Japan by an old acquaintance, he is embroiled in a conflict that forces him to confront his own demons.

Name: Resident Evil
Credit: Dir: Paul W.S. Anderson With: Milla Jovovich, Michelle Rodriguez, Ryan McCluskey
Outline: A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident.

Name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
Credit: Dir: Francis Lawrence With: Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth
Outline: Katniss Everdeen is in District 13 after she shatters the games forever. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss spreads her wings as she fights to save Peeta and a nation moved by her courage.

Name: Event Horizon
Credit: Dir: Paul W.S. Anderson With: Laurence Fishburne, Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan
Outline: A rescue crew investigates a spaceship that disappeared into a black hole and has now returned...with someone or something new on-board.

Name: The Last Starfighter
Credit: Dir: Nick Castle With: Lance Guest, Robert Preston, Kay E. Kuter
Outline: A discouraged video-gaming boy finds himself recruited as a gunner for an alien defense force.

Name: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
Credit: Dir: Gavin Hood With: Hugh Jackman, Liev Schreiber, Ryan Reynolds
Outline: A look at Wolverine's early life, in particular his time with the government squad Team X and the impact it will have on his later years.

Name: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
Credit: Dir: Lorene Scafaria With: Steve Carell, Keira Knightley, Melanie Lynskey
Outline: As an asteroid nears Earth, a man finds himself alone after his wife leaves in a panic. He decides to take a road trip to reunite with his high school sweetheart. Accompanying him is a neighbor who inadvertently puts a wrench in his plan.

Name: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
Credit: Dir: George Lucas With: Hayden Christensen, Natalie Portman, Ewan McGregor
Outline: Ten years after initially meeting, Anakin Skywalker shares a forbidden romance with PadmÃ©, while Obi-Wan investigates an assassination attempt on the Senator and discovers a secret clone army crafted for the Jedi.

Name: Ender's Game
Credit: Dir: Gavin Hood With: Harrison Ford, Asa Butterfield, Hailee Steinfeld
Outline: Young Ender Wiggin is recruited by the International Military to lead the fight against the Formics, a genocidal alien race which nearly annihilated the human race in a previous invasion.

Name: The Chronicles of Riddick
Credit: Dir: David Twohy With: Vin Diesel, Judi Dench, Colm Feore
Outline: The wanted criminal Riddick arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.

Name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2
Credit: Dir: Francis Lawrence With: Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth
Outline: As the war of Panem escalates to the destruction of other districts, Katniss Everdeen, the reluctant leader of the rebellion, must bring together an army against President Snow, while all she holds dear hangs in the balance.

Name: In Time
Credit: Dir: Andrew Niccol With: Justin Timberlake, Amanda Seyfried, Cillian Murphy
Outline: In a future where people stop aging at 25, but are engineered to live only one more year, having the means to buy your way out of the situation is a shot at immortal youth. Here, Will Salas finds himself accused of murder and on the run with a hostage - a connection that becomes an important part of the way against the system.

Name: Home
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
Credit: Dir: Tim Johnson With: Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin
Outline: An alien on the run from his own people makes friends with a girl. He tries to help her on her quest, but can be an interference.

Name: Blade II
Credit: Dir: Guillermo del Toro With: Wesley Snipes, Kris Kristofferson, Ron Perlman
Outline: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reaper vampires who feed on vampires.

Name: Cocoon
Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Don Ameche, Wilford Brimley, Hume Cronyn
Outline: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigour.

Name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
Credit: Dir: Leonard Nimoy With: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley
Outline: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

Name: Elysium
Credit: Dir: Neill Blomkamp With: Matt Damon, Jodie Foster, Sharlto Copley
Outline: In the year 2154, the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth. A man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.

Name: Blindness
Credit: Dir: Fernando Meirelles With: Julianne Moore, Mark Ruffalo, Gael GarcÃ­a Bernal
Outline: A city is ravaged by an epidemic of instant "white blindness". Those first afflicted are quarantined...

Name: The Running Man
Credit: Dir: Paul Michael Glaser With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Maria Conchita Alonso, Yaphet Kotto
Outline: A wrongly convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a game show.

Name: Terminator Salvation
Credit: Dir: McG With: Christian Bale, Sam Worthington, Anton Yelchin
Outline: In 2018, a mysterious new weapon in the war against the machines, half-human and half-machine, comes to John Connor on the eve of a resistance attack on Skynet. But whose side is he on, and can he be trusted?

Name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
Credit: Dir: Jay Roach With: Mike Myers, Heather Graham, Michael York
Outline: Dr. Evil is back...and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 60's and steal Austin Powers's mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

Name: Attack the Block
Credit: Dir: Joe Cornish With: John Boyega, Jodie Whittaker, Alex Esmail
Outline: A teen gang in South London defend their block from an alien invasion.

Name: The Manchurian Candidate
Credit: Dir: Jonathan Demme With: Denzel Washington, Liev Schreiber, Meryl Streep
Outline: In the midst of the Gulf War, soldiers are kidnapped and brainwashed for sinister purposes.

Name: Armageddon
Credit: Dir: Michael Bay With: Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton, Ben Affleck
Outline: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, N.A.S.A. recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.

Name: Demolition Man
Credit: Dir: Marco Brambilla With: Sylvester Stallone, Wesley Snipes, Sandra Bullock
Outline: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

Name: Weird Science
Credit: Dir: John Hughes With: Anthony Michael Hall, Ilan Mitchell-Smith, Kelly LeBrock
Outline: Two high school nerds attempt to create the perfect woman, but she turns out to be more than that.

Name: John Carter
Credit: Dir: Andrew Stanton With: Taylor Kitsch, Lynn Collins, Willem Dafoe
Outline: Transported to Barsoom, a Civil War vet discovers a barren planet seemingly inhabited by 12-foot tall barbarians. Finding himself prisoner of these creatures, he escapes, only to encounter Woola and a princess in desperate need of a savior.

Name: Titan A.E.
Credit: Dir: Don Bluth, Gary Goldman With: Matt Damon, Drew Barrymore, Bill Pullman
Outline: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.

Name: Dune
Credit: Dir: David Lynch With: Kyle MacLachlan, Virginia Madsen, Francesca Annis
Outline: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

Name: Underworld: Rise of the Lycans
Credit: Dir: Patrick Tatopoulos With: Rhona Mitra, Michael Sheen, Bill Nighy
Outline: An origins story centered on the centuries-old feud between the race of aristocratic vampires and their onetime slaves, the Lycans.

Name: Star Trek: Generations
Credit: Dir: David Carson With: Patrick Stewart, William Shatner, Malcolm McDowell
Outline: Captain Picard, with the help of supposedly dead Captain Kirk, must stop a madman willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter an energy ribbon.

Name: Terminator Genisys
Credit: Dir: Alan Taylor With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jason Clarke, Emilia Clarke
Outline: When John Connor, leader of the human resistance, sends Sgt. Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect Sarah Connor and safeguard the future, an unexpected turn of events creates a fractured timeline.

Name: Short Circuit
Credit: Dir: John Badham With: Ally Sheedy, Steve Guttenberg, Fisher Stevens
Outline: Number 5 of a group of experimental robots in a lab is electrocuted, suddenly becomes intelligent, and escapes.

Name: Monsters vs. Aliens
Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Sci-Fi
Credit: Dir: Rob Letterman, Conrad Vernon With: Reese Witherspoon, Rainn Wilson, Stephen Colbert
Outline: A woman transformed into a giant after she is struck by a meteorite on her wedding day becomes part of a team of monsters sent in by the U.S. government to defeat an alien mastermind trying to take over Earth.

Name: Blast from the Past
Credit: Dir: Hugh Wilson With: Brendan Fraser, Alicia Silverstone, Christopher Walken
Outline: A romantic comedy about a naive man who comes out into the world after being in a nuclear fallout shelter for 35 years.

Name: Idiocracy
Credit: Dir: Mike Judge With: Luke Wilson, Maya Rudolph, Dax Shepard
Outline: Private Joe Bauers, the definition of "average American", is selected by the Pentagon to be the guinea pig for a top-secret hibernation program. Forgotten, he awakes five centuries in the future. He discovers a society so incredibly dumbed down that he's easily the most intelligent person alive.

Name: Flatliners
Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Kiefer Sutherland, Kevin Bacon, Julia Roberts
Outline: Four Medical students experiment on "near death" experiences that involve past tragedies until the dark consequences begin to jeopardize their lives.

Name: Stake Land
Credit: Dir: Jim Mickle With: Connor Paolo, Nick Damici, Kelly McGillis
Outline: Martin was a normal teenage boy before the country collapsed in an empty pit of economic and political disaster...

Name: Ghostbusters II
Credit: Dir: Ivan Reitman With: Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver
Outline: The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.

Name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
Credit: Dir: George Lucas With: Ewan McGregor, Liam Neeson, Natalie Portman
Outline: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to reclaim their old glory.

Name: The Giver
Credit: Dir: Phillip Noyce With: Brenton Thwaites, Jeff Bridges, Meryl Streep
Outline: In a seemingly perfect community, without war, pain, suffering, differences or choice, a young boy is chosen to learn from an elderly man about the true pain and pleasure of the "real" world.

Name: City of Ember
Credit: Dir: Gil Kenan With: Saoirse Ronan, Toby Jones, Bill Murray
Outline: For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing ... and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker.

Name: Self/less
Credit: Dir: Tarsem Singh With: Ryan Reynolds, Natalie Martinez, Matthew Goode
Outline: A dying real estate mogul transfers his consciousness into a healthy young body, but soon finds that neither the procedure nor the company that performed it are quite what they seem.

Name: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Jeff Goldblum, Julianne Moore, Pete Postlethwaite
Outline: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there while another team approaches with another agenda.

Name: Tomorrowland
Credit: Dir: Brad Bird With: George Clooney, Britt Robertson, Hugh Laurie
Outline: Bound by a shared destiny, a teen bursting with scientific curiosity and a former boy-genius inventor embark on a mission to unearth the secrets of a place somewhere in time and space that exists in their collective memory.

Name: Slither
Credit: Dir: James Gunn With: Nathan Fillion, Elizabeth Banks, Michael Rooker
Outline: A small town is taken over by an alien plague, turning residents into zombies and all forms of mutant monsters.

Name: Godzilla
Credit: Dir: Gareth Edwards With: Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Elizabeth Olsen, Bryan Cranston
Outline: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

Name: War of the Worlds
Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Tom Cruise, Dakota Fanning, Tim Robbins
Outline: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival.

Name: Europa Report
Credit: Dir: SebastiÃ¡n Cordero With: Sharlto Copley, Michael Nyqvist, Christian Camargo
Outline: An international crew of astronauts undertakes a privately funded mission to search for life on Jupiter's fourth largest moon.

Name: The Purge: Anarchy
Credit: Dir: James DeMonaco With: Frank Grillo, Carmen Ejogo, Zach Gilford
Outline: Three groups of people are trying to survive Purge Night, when their stories intertwine and are left stranded in The Purge trying to survive the chaos and violence that occurs.

Name: Daybreakers
Credit: Dir: Michael Spierig, Peter Spierig With: Ethan Hawke, Willem Dafoe, Sam Neill
Outline: In the year 2019, a plague has transformed almost every human into vampires. Faced with a dwindling blood supply, the fractured dominant race plots their survival; meanwhile, a researcher works with a covert band of vamps on a way to save humankind.

Name: Hot Tub Time Machine
Credit: Dir: Steve Pink With: John Cusack, Rob Corddry, Craig Robinson
Outline: A malfunctioning time machine at a ski resort takes a man back to 1986 with his two friends and nephew, where they must relive a fateful night and not change anything to make sure the nephew is born.

Name: Flash Gordon
Credit: Dir: Mike Hodges With: Sam J. Jones, Melody Anderson, Max von Sydow
Outline: A football player and his friends travel to the planet Mongo and find themselves fighting the tyranny of Ming the Merciless to save Earth.

Name: Star Trek: Nemesis
Credit: Dir: Stuart Baird With: Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner
Outline: The Enterprise is diverted to the Romulan homeworld Romulus, supposedly because they want to negotiate a peace treaty.

Name: John Dies at the End
Credit: Dir: Don Coscarelli With: Chase Williamson, Rob Mayes, Paul Giamatti
Outline: A new street drug that sends its users across time and dimensions has one drawback: some people return as no longer human. Can two college dropouts save humankind from this silent, otherworldly invasion?

Name: Alien³
Credit: Dir: David Fincher With: Sigourney Weaver, Charles S. Dutton, Charles Dance
Outline: After the last encounter LT Ellen Ripley crash lands on Fiorina Fury 161, a deep space maximum security prison . When a serial killer haunts the facility, Ripley realizes that she brought along an unwelcome visitor.

Name: Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within
Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Fantasy | Romance | Sci-Fi
Credit: Dir: Hironobu Sakaguchi, Motonori Sakakibara With: Alec Baldwin, Steve Buscemi, Ming-Na Wen
Outline: A scientist makes a last stand on Earth with the help of a ragtag team of soldiers against an invasion of alien phantoms.

Name: The Faculty
Credit: Dir: Robert Rodriguez With: Jordana Brewster, Clea DuVall, Laura Harris
Outline: Students suspect that their teachers are aliens after bizarre occurrences.

Name: The Nines
Credit: Dir: John August With: Ryan Reynolds, Hope Davis, Melissa McCarthy
Outline: A troubled actor, a television show runner, and an acclaimed videogame designer find their lives intertwining in mysterious and unsettling ways.

Name: Riddick
Credit: Dir: David Twohy With: Vin Diesel, Karl Urban, Katee Sackhoff
Outline: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, Riddick finds himself up against an alien race of predators. Activating an emergency beacon alerts two ships: one carrying a new breed of mercenary, the other captained by a man from Riddick's past.

Name: Predators
Credit: Dir: NimrÃ³d Antal With: Adrien Brody, Laurence Fishburne, Topher Grace
Outline: A group of elite warriors are hunted by members of a merciless alien race known as Predators.

Name: The Day After Tomorrow
Credit: Dir: Roland Emmerich With: Dennis Quaid, Jake Gyllenhaal, Emmy Rossum
Outline: Jack Hall, paleoclimatologist, must make a daring trek across America to reach his son, trapped in the cross-hairs of a sudden international storm which plunges the planet into a new Ice Age.

Name: Monsters
Credit: Dir: Gareth Edwards With: Scoot McNairy, Whitney Able, Mario Zuniga Benavides
Outline: Six years after Earth has suffered an alien invasion a cynical journalist agrees to escort a shaken American tourist through an infected zone in Mexico to the safety of the US border.

Name: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
Credit: Dir: Wes Ball With: Dylan O'Brien, Kaya Scodelario, Thomas Brodie-Sangster
Outline: After having escaped the Maze, the Gladers now face a new set of challenges on the open roads of a desolate landscape filled with unimaginable obstacles.

Name: Phenomenon
Credit: Dir: Jon Turteltaub With: John Travolta, Kyra Sedgwick, Forest Whitaker
Outline: An ordinary man sees a bright light descend from the sky, and discovers he now has super-intelligence and telekinesis.

Name: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein
Credit: Dir: Kenneth Branagh With: Robert De Niro, Kenneth Branagh, Helena Bonham Carter
Outline: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

Name: Star Trek: Insurrection
Credit: Dir: Jonathan Frakes With: Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner
Outline: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

Name: Darkman
Credit: Dir: Sam Raimi With: Liam Neeson, Frances McDormand, Colin Friels
Outline: A brilliant scientist left for dead returns to exact revenge on the people who burned him alive.

Name: Upside Down
Credit: Dir: Juan Solanas With: Jim Sturgess, Kirsten Dunst, Timothy Spall
Outline: Adam and Eden fell in love as teens despite the fact that they live on twinned worlds with gravities that pull in opposite directions. Ten years after a forced separation, Adam sets out on a dangerous quest to reconnect with his love.

Name: Death Race
Credit: Dir: Paul W.S. Anderson With: Jason Statham, Joan Allen, Tyrese Gibson
Outline: Ex-con Jensen Ames is forced by the warden of a notorious prison to compete in our post-industrial world's most popular sport: a car race in which inmates must brutalize and kill one another on the road to victory.

Name: The Rocketeer
Credit: Dir: Joe Johnston With: Billy Campbell, Jennifer Connelly, Alan Arkin
Outline: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high flying masked hero.

Name: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
Credit: Dir: Robert Wise With: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley
Outline: When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral Kirk resumes command of the Starship Enterprise in order to intercept, examine and hopefully stop the intruder.

Name: Lucy
Credit: Dir: Luc Besson With: Scarlett Johansson, Morgan Freeman, Min-sik Choi
Outline: A woman, accidentally caught in a dark deal, turns the tables on her captors and transforms into a merciless warrior evolved beyond human logic.

Name: Project Almanac
Credit: Dir: Dean Israelite With: Amy Landecker, Sofia Black-D'Elia, Virginia Gardner
Outline: A group of teens discover secret plans of a time machine, and construct one. However, things start to get out of control.

Name: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
Credit: Dir: Jonathan Mostow With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nick Stahl, Kristanna Loken
Outline: A cybernetic warrior from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a 19-year old drifter and his future wife from a most advanced robotic assassin and to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.

Name: Robots
Credit: Dir: Chris Wedge, Carlos Saldanha With: Ewan McGregor, Halle Berry, Mel Brooks
Outline: In a robot world, a young idealistic inventor travels to the big city to join his inspiration's company, only to find himself opposing its sinister new management.

Name: Repo Men
Credit: Dir: Miguel Sapochnik With: Jude Law, Forest Whitaker, Alice Braga
Outline: Set in the near future when artificial organs can be bought on credit, it revolves around a man who struggles to make the payments on a heart he has purchased. He must therefore go on the run before said ticker is repossessed.

Name: TMNT
Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
Credit: Dir: Kevin Munroe With: Patrick Stewart, Mako, Chris Evans
Outline: When the world is threatened by an ancient evil, the four adolescent turtles must reunite and overcome their faults in order to stand against it.

Name: Mars Attacks!
Credit: Dir: Tim Burton With: Jack Nicholson, Pierce Brosnan, Sarah Jessica Parker
Outline: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

Name: Dark Skies
Credit: Dir: Scott Stewart With: Keri Russell, Jake Brennan, Josh Hamilton
Outline: As the Barret family's peaceful suburban life is rocked by an escalating series of disturbing events, they come to learn that a terrifying and deadly force is after them.

Name: Insurgent
Credit: Dir: Robert Schwentke With: Shailene Woodley, Ansel Elgort, Theo James
Outline: Beatrice Prior must confront her inner demons and continue her fight against a powerful alliance which threatens to tear her society apart with the help from others on her side.

Name: The Cell
Credit: Dir: Tarsem Singh With: Jennifer Lopez, Vince Vaughn, Vincent D'Onofrio
Outline: An FBI agent persuades a social worker, who is adept with a new experimental technology, to enter the mind of a comatose serial killer in order to learn where he has hidden his latest kidnap victim.

Name: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
Credit: Dir: Michael Bay With: Shia LaBeouf, Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, Tyrese Gibson
Outline: The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets.

Name: Resident Evil: Extinction
Credit: Dir: Russell Mulcahy With: Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter, Oded Fehr
Outline: Survivors of the Raccoon City catastrophe travel across the Nevada desert, hoping to make it to Alaska. Alice joins the caravan and their fight against the evil Umbrella Corp.

Name: Transcendence
Credit: Dir: Wally Pfister With: Johnny Depp, Rebecca Hall, Morgan Freeman
Outline: A scientist's drive for artificial intelligence, takes on dangerous implications when his consciousness is uploaded into one such program.

Name: Total Recall
Credit: Dir: Len Wiseman With: Colin Farrell, Bokeem Woodbine, Bryan Cranston
Outline: A factory worker, Douglas Quaid, begins to suspect that he is a spy after visiting Rekall - a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led - goes wrong and he finds himself on the run.

Name: Space Jam
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Sport
Credit: Dir: Joe Pytka With: Michael Jordan, Wayne Knight, Theresa Randle
Outline: Michael Jordan agrees to help the Looney Tunes play a basketball game vs. alien slavers to determine their freedom.

Name: Alien: Resurrection
Credit: Dir: Jean-Pierre Jeunet With: Sigourney Weaver, Winona Ryder, Dominique Pinon
Outline: Two centuries after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone who must continue her war against the aliens.

Name: Under the Skin
Credit: Dir: Jonathan Glazer With: Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy McWilliams, Lynsey Taylor Mackay
Outline: A mysterious woman seduces lonely men in the evening hours in Scotland. Events lead her to begin a process of self-discovery.

Name: Surrogates
Credit: Dir: Jonathan Mostow With: Bruce Willis, Radha Mitchell, Ving Rhames
Outline: Set in a futuristic world where humans live in isolation and interact through surrogate robots, a cop is forced to leave his home for the first time in years in order to investigate the murders of others' surrogates.

Name: Paycheck
Credit: Dir: John Woo With: Ben Affleck, Aaron Eckhart, Uma Thurman
Outline: What seemed like a breezy idea for an engineer to net him millions of dollars, leaves him on the run for his life and piecing together why he's being chased.

Name: Outlander
Credit: Dir: Howard McCain With: Jim Caviezel, Sophia Myles, Ron Perlman
Outline: During the reign of the Vikings, Kainan, a man from a far-off world, crash lands on Earth, bringing with him an alien predator known as the Moorwen. Though both man and monster are seeking revenge for violence committed against them, Kainan leads the alliance to kill the Moorwen by fusing his advanced technology with the Viking's Iron Age weaponry.

Name: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
Credit: Dir: Joe Johnston With: Rick Moranis, Matt Frewer, Marcia Strassman
Outline: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

Name: Moonraker
Credit: Dir: Lewis Gilbert With: Roger Moore, Lois Chiles, Michael Lonsdale
Outline: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

Name: The Thing
Credit: Dir: Matthijs van Heijningen Jr. With: Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Joel Edgerton, Ulrich Thomsen
Outline: At an Antarctica research site, the discovery of an alien craft leads to a confrontation between graduate student Kate Lloyd and scientist Dr. Sander Halvorson.

Name: Predator 2
Credit: Dir: Stephen Hopkins With: Danny Glover, Gary Busey, Kevin Peter Hall
Outline: Amidst a territorial gang war in 1997, a sophisticated alien hunter stalks the citizens of Los Angeles and the only man between him and his prey is veteran L.A.P.D. officer, Lieutenant Mike Harrigan.

Name: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
Credit: Dir: George Miller, George Ogilvie With: Mel Gibson, Tina Turner, Bruce Spence
Outline: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

Name: Solaris
Credit: Dir: Steven Soderbergh With: George Clooney, Natascha McElhone, Ulrich Tukur
Outline: A troubled psychologist is sent to investigate the crew of an isolated research station orbiting a bizarre planet.

Name: Forever Young
Credit: Dir: Steve Miner With: Mel Gibson, Jamie Lee Curtis, Elijah Wood
Outline: During a cryogenics test, a pilot frozen in 1939 awakes in 1992 but time is running out, as his body starts to age rapidly.

Name: Next
Credit: Dir: Lee Tamahori With: Nicolas Cage, Julianne Moore, Jessica Biel

Name: Highlander II: The Quickening
Credit: Dir: Russell Mulcahy With: Christopher Lambert, Sean Connery, Virginia Madsen
Outline: In the future, Highlander Connor MacLeod must prevent the destruction of Earth under an anti-ozone shield.

Name: Super Mario Bros.
Credit: Dir: Annabel Jankel, Rocky Morton With: Bob Hoskins, John Leguizamo, Dennis Hopper
Outline: Two Brooklyn plumbers, Mario and Luigi, must travel to another dimension to rescue a princess from the evil dictator King Koopa and stop him from taking over the world.

Name: Plan 9 from Outer Space
Credit: Dir: Edward D. Wood Jr. With: Gregory Walcott, Tom Keene, Mona McKinnon
Outline: Aliens resurrect dead humans as zombies and vampires to stop humanity from creating the Solaranite (a sort of sun-driven bomb).

Name: RoboCop 3
Credit: Dir: Fred Dekker With: Nancy Allen, Robert John Burke, Mario Machado
Outline: Robocop saves the day once more. This time the half man/half robot takes on ruthless developers who want to evict some people on "their" land.

Name: The Avengers
Credit: Dir: Jeremiah S. Chechik With: Ralph Fiennes, Uma Thurman, Sean Connery
Outline: Two British agents (John Steed and Emma Peel) team up to stop Sir August De Wynter from destroying the world with a weather changing machine.

Name: Batman & Robin
Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, George Clooney, Chris O'Donnell
Outline: Batman & Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.

Name: Mortal Kombat: Annihilation
Credit: Dir: John R. Leonetti With: Robin Shou, Talisa Soto, James Remar
Outline: A group of martial arts warriors have only six days to save the Earth from an extra-dimensional invasion.

Name: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
Credit: Dir: Sidney J. Furie With: Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder
Outline: The Man of Steel crusades for nuclear disarmament and meets Lex Luthor's latest creation, Nuclear Man.

Name: Dragonball: Evolution
Credit: Dir: James Wong With: Justin Chatwin, James Marsters, Yun-Fat Chow
Outline: The young warrior Son Goku sets out on a quest, racing against time and the vengeful King Piccolo, to collect a set of seven magical orbs that will grant their wielder unlimited power.

Name: Battlefield Earth
Credit: Dir: Roger Christian With: John Travolta, Forest Whitaker, Barry Pepper
Outline: After enslavement and near extermination by an alien race in the year 3000, humanity begins to fight back.

Name: Alone in the Dark
Credit: Dir: Uwe Boll With: Christian Slater, Tara Reid, Stephen Dorff
Outline: Based on the video game, Alone in the Dark focuses on Edward Carnby, a detective of the paranormal, who slowly unravels mysterious events with deadly results.
